channel.title: ECB | Indian rupee (INR) - Euro foreign exchange reference rates
channel.description: The reference rates are based on the regular daily concertation procedure between central banks within and outside the European System of Central Banks, which normally takes place at 2.15 p.m. (14:15) ECB time.

item.title: 104.7330 INR = 1 EUR 2025-12-05 ECB Reference rate
item.description: 1 EUR buys 104.7330 Indian rupee (INR) - The reference exchange rates are published both by electronic market information providers and on the ECB's website shortly after the concertation procedure has been completed. Reference rates are published according to the same calendar as the TARGET system.
